verses.verse: And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> that they should <S%H4191>kill<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1732>David.<s%>

But <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H7586>Saul's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H2654>delighted<s%> <S%H3966>much<s%> in <S%H1732>David:<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H1245>seeketh<s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> thee: <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> take heed to <S%H8104>thyself<s%> until the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H3427>abide<s%> in a <S%H5643>secret<s%> place, and hide thyself: <S%H2244><s%>

And <S%H589>I<s%> will go <S%H3318>out<s%> and <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H3027>beside<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art, and <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H1696>commune<s%> <S%H413>with<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> of thee; and <S%H4100>what<s%> I <S%H7200>see,<s%> that I will <S%H5046>tell<s%> thee.

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, Let <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2398>sin<s%> against his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> against <S%H1732>David;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against thee, and <S%H3588>because<s%> his <S%H4639>works<s%> have been to thee-ward <S%H3966>very<s%> good: <S%H2896><s%>

For he did <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H5315>life<s%> in his <S%H3709>hand,<s%> and <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>wrought<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8668>salvation<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> thou <S%H7200>sawest<s%> it, and didst <S%H8055>rejoice:<s%> <S%H4100>wherefore<s%> then wilt thou <S%H2398>sin<s%> against <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood,<s%> to <S%H4191>slay<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> without a <S%H2600>cause?<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3083>Jonathan:<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7650>swore,<s%> As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth,<s%> he shall <S%H518>not<s%> be <S%H4191>slain.<s%>

And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H5046>showed<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H1697>things.<s%> And <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and he <S%H1961>was<s%> in his <S%H6440>presence,<s%> as in times <S%H8032>past.<s%> <S%H865><s%>

And there <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H3254>again:<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> went <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H3898>fought<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and <S%H5221>slew<s%> them with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4347>slaughter;<s%> and they <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H6440><s%> him.

And the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H7307>spirit<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H413>upon<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> as <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> in his <S%H1004>house<s%> with his <S%H2595>javelin<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand:<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5059>played<s%> with his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> to <S%H5221>smite<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> even to the <S%H7023>wall<s%> with the <S%H2595>javelin;<s%> but he slipped <S%H6362>away<s%> out of Saul's <S%H4480>presence,<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H7586><s%> and he <S%H5221>smote<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2595>javelin<s%> into the <S%H7023>wall:<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5127>fled,<s%> and <S%H4422>escaped<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3915>night.<s%>

Saul <S%H7586><s%> also <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> to <S%H8104>watch<s%> him, and to <S%H4191>slay<s%> him in the <S%H1242>morning:<s%> and <S%H4324>Michal<s%> <S%H1732>David's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> thou <S%H4422>save<s%> <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H5315>life<s%> <S%H3915>tonight,<s%> <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt be <S%H4191>slain.<s%>
So <S%H4324>Michal<s%> let David <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1732><s%> <S%H1157>through<s%> a <S%H2474>window:<s%> and he <S%H1980>went,<s%> and <S%H1272>fled,<s%> and <S%H4422>escaped.<s%>

And <S%H4324>Michal<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> an <S%H8655>image,<s%> and <S%H7760>laid<s%> it <S%H413>in<s%> the <S%H4296>bed,<s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H3523>pillow<s%> of <S%H5795>goats'<s%> hair for his <S%H4763>bolster,<s%> and <S%H3680>covered<s%> it with a <S%H899>cloth.<s%>
And when <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1931>He<s%> is <S%H2470>sick.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> again to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Bring him <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> me in the <S%H4296>bed,<s%> that I may <S%H4191>slay<s%> him.

And when the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> were come <S%H935>in,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there was an <S%H8655>image<s%> <S%H413>in<s%> the <S%H4296>bed,<s%> with a <S%H3523>pillow<s%> of <S%H5795>goats'<s%> hair for his <S%H4763>bolster.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4324>Michal,<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> hast thou <S%H7411>deceived<s%> me <S%H3602>so,<s%> and sent <S%H7971>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> mine <S%H341>enemy,<s%> that he is <S%H4422>escaped?<s%> And <S%H4324>Michal<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> <S%H413><s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H1931>He<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, Let me <S%H7971>go;<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> should I <S%H4191>kill<s%> thee?

So <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1272>fled,<s%> and <S%H4422>escaped,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> to <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H853>him<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to him. And <S%H1931>he<s%> and <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in <S%H5121>Naioth.<s%>
And it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> is at <S%H5121>Naioth<s%> in <S%H7414>Ramah.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1732>David:<s%> and when they <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3862>company<s%> of the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H5012>prophesying,<s%> and <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H5975>standing<s%> as <S%H5324>appointed<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> them, the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5012>prophesied.<s%>

And when it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H4397>messengers,<s%> and <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H1571>likewise.<s%> And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> the <S%H7992>third<s%> time, and <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H1571>also.<s%>

Then <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> to <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H953>well<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is in <S%H7906>Sechu:<s%> and he <S%H7592>asked<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H375>Where<s%> are <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> and <S%H1732>David?<s%> And one <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> they be at <S%H5121>Naioth<s%> in <S%H7414>Ramah.<s%>

And he <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H8033>thither<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H5121>Naioth<s%> in <S%H7414>Ramah:<s%> and the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H1931>him<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> and he went <S%H1980>on,<s%> <S%H1980><s%> and <S%H5012>prophesied,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H5121>Naioth<s%> in <S%H7414>Ramah.<s%>

And <S%H1931>he<s%> stripped <S%H6584>off<s%> his <S%H899>clothes<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> and <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> in like <S%H1571>manner,<s%> and lay <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H6174>naked<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3915>night.<s%> <S%H5921>Wherefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they <S%H559>say,<s%> Is <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> among the <S%H5030>prophets?<s%>
